clean_data: IT Security Analyst span lITspan span lSecurityspan span lAnalystspan Sr IT Security Analyst US EPA Office OCFO Alexandria VA Authorized to work in the US for any employer Work Experience IT Security Analyst State of Alabama Montgomery AL December 2015 to September 2016 The CARES Project is an eligibility and enrollment services for lifecritical support programs to families in need through State sponsored Medicaid CHIP and DHR for Alabama State This was a 100m project spanning through multiple state agencies Worked with ISSM to ensure that management operational and technical controls for securing sensitive security systems complied with special publication 80053 requirements Assisted the System Owners and ISSM in preparing Certification and Accreditation packages for their IT systems Reviewed and updated some of the artifacts especially FIPS 199 SP 80060 Initial Risk Assessment SP 80037 EAuthentication PII PTA PIA STE SAR and the POAM Ensured that Contingency Planning and Contingency Planning Test are carried Conduct Annual SelfAssessments identified and communicate IT audit findings to senior management Established and documented compliance with information security policies and standards Performed risk assessments for information technology assets using the risk management process and the process defined in the Federal Information Security Management Act FISMA As a QA Engineer I concentrate testing efforts on POAM highly critical eligibility system for Medicaid Medicare DHR and other federal and local government systems Participated in working Sessions and Reviews with ISSM CCP IR Analysts Security Assessors and other support staff on the project Performed Hub calls and document Requests and Responses from CMS through the coded UI and the CARES internal Test Harness Collaborated with Technology and Operations teams to communicate any application deficiencies bugs that are uncovered during testing along with defect resolution Security Analyst Bank of America Atlanta GA December 2008 to March 2010 Managed internal IT audit engagements including system platform audits PCI Compliance for the bank Readiness reviews IT Risk Assessments change management and business process control assurance Managed security control assessments of Payment Systems for merchant boarding and settlement of funds Collaborated with Information Technology and Operations areas to proactively assess security policy compliance and monitor risk Coordinated external 3rd party auditors including PCI DSS SAS 70 Record Retention and Business Process Improvement reviews Performed investigations of internal fraud or presumptive fraud with a view to gathering evidence that could be presented in a court of law Coordinated and perform compliance audits in accordance to the information protection data asset and threat provisions under the GrammLeachBliley and SarbanesOxley Acts Coordinate with Incident Response teams for postevent diagnosis investigation and documentation Evaluated and assess implementation of the disaster recoverybusiness continuity plan Provided effective project audit guidance and leadership to team members and management as it relates to data security and industry compliance Education MBA Howard University Washington DC BS in Certified Information Security Manager University of the District of Columbia Skills DATABASE 6 years SOLARIS 3 years UNIX 3 years UNIX SHELL 6 years NET Less than 1 year JAVA Less than 1 year Additional Information Technical Skills Operating Systems Windows 20082012 Linux HPUX Sun Solaris Tools SharePoint Microsoft Visual Studio TFS Microsoft Office LoadRunner 1253 Enterprise Database SQL Server2012 Oracle9i 10g 11g 12C Programming Languages SQL Java Unix shell C JSON
